whose.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: used to ask which person or people a particular thing belongs to
whose.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: used to show the relationship between a person or thing and something that belongs to that person or thing
whose.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Thatâ€™s the man whose house has burned down.
Solar energy is an idea whose time has come.
whose.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: used to give additional information about a person or thing
whose.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Jurors, whose identities will be kept secret, will be paid $40 a day.
